pages.title: The Cold Snap Horde
pages.text: The Cold Snap Horde is a group of angry snowmen that are trying to kill players, villagers and golems. They can be found in any cold biome. To stay safe you can wear a $(l:patchouli_jam:cold_snap_horde/hat)Top Hat$() to trick them, so long as they don't watch you put it on.

pages.title: Snowman Gunner
pages.text: This one fires coal at you from a toy gun. It may sometimes blind you for a short time.

pages.title: Snowman Stabber
pages.text: This madman runs around with a knife to kill everyone in sight.

pages.title: Snowman Snowballer
pages.text: This tradition-conscious snowman will shoot $(l:patchouli_jam:cold_snap_horde/snowballs)Snow Covered Rock$() at you.
